amendment.description: An amendment printed in Part B of House Report 110-143 and considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 387.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
